channel.title: Please add a rejoin button if you have to quit a game
channel.description:
Hi,
I'd really, really like to see a rejoin/reconnect button if you are forced to quit the game for whatever reason.
I've recently [been having trouble with my graphics card in a few games](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/game-breaking-bug-game-makes-graphics-card-restart-causes-black-game-window/75546), and have had no option but to exit the game after the contents of the game window goes black.
There have been other times where I have been unable to rejoin, e.g. connection issues.
I would be very appreciative if a re-join button was added to the game.
If you're scared of players leaving/rejoining as a form of troll, you can just add it as a valid report reason.
LoL has a rejoin button, so why can't ToL?
